thread.section_title: The Peninsula Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An amazing quiet wonder
thread.title_full: An amazing quiet wonder - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: intrepidtravelerfla
title: An amazing quiet wonder
text: Stayed here last weekend on my way back to the US. The hotel is better than the reviews suggest. I have never stayed in a quieter hotel than this anywhere in the world. Was upgraded to an amazing room and my stay was flawless. The only challenge is it takes a while to deal with all of the electronics but once you master them, amazing. Highly recommend. Thank you.
